attributes.action: We  ask the government to repeal the Public Order Act.where it was extended.
attributes.background: The last Labour Government extended  the above act,this has a major affect on a citzens rights of freedom of speech and expression. Writers,poets and ordainary people,including children are affected by this act.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what changes you would like Parliament to make to the law.
